symbol.sql: SELECT SymbolId, ExTime, OpenPrice, HighPrice, LowPrice, ClosePrice, DealVol, DealAmt FROM dbo.TWFE_Futures_M_Deal WHERE SymbolId = '{0}' AND ExTime BETWEEN '{1}' AND '{2}'
